title: John the Baptist Prepares the Way
summary: Mark 1 introduces John the Baptist, who prepares the way for Jesus by preaching repentance and baptizing people in the Jordan River. Jesus is baptized by John, and God affirms Him as His beloved Son. Jesus then faces temptation in the wilderness. Afterward, He begins His public ministry in Galilee, calling His first disciples and performing miracles, including casting out demons and healing the sick.

faq.question: What is a key message in Mark 1?
faq.answer: It emphasizes the servant nature of Jesus and the power of faith in action.

faq.question: What does Mark 1 reveal about Jesus?
faq.answer: It shows His authority, compassion, and call to follow Him wholeheartedly.
